languages.text: "Благодарю за предостережение, Ваша Светлость. Я и сама совершенно не горю желанием отправиться под суд вслед за Владаймом. Чем больше времени проходит, тем больше я ценю возможность быть просто барменом".

"Thank you for the warning, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. After Vladaym's trial, I don't exactly find him an inspiring example. The more time passes, the more I appreciate the opportunity to be a simple bartender."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за предостережение, Ваша Светлость. Я и сама совершенно не горю желанием отправиться под суд вслед за Владаймом. Чем больше времени проходит, тем больше я ценю возможность быть просто барменом".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for the warning, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. After Vladaym's trial, I myself don't exactly find him an inspiring example. The more time passes, the more I appreciate the opportunity to be a simple bartender."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “谢谢您的警告，大人。弗拉迪姆接受审判之后，我觉得他这个榜样并不怎么值得学习。时间过得越久，我就越是珍惜身为普通酒保的生活。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the warning, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. After Vladaym's trial, I don't exactly find him an inspiring example. The more time passes, the more I appreciate the opportunity to be a simple bartender."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢您的警告，大人。弗拉迪姆接受审判之后，我觉得他这个榜样并不怎么值得学习。时间过得越久，我就越是珍惜身为普通酒保的生活。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「警告をありがとうございます、陛下。ヴラダイムの裁判以降、私はあまり彼を慕ってはいないのです。時間が経つにつれ、平凡なバーテンダーでいる事に価値を見出してきました」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the warning, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. After Vladaym's trial, I don't exactly find him an inspiring example. The more time passes, the more I appreciate the opportunity to be a simple bartender."

traits.locale_text: 「警告をありがとうございます、陛下。ヴラダイムの裁判以降、私はあまり彼を慕ってはいないのです。時間が経つにつれ、平凡なバーテンダーでいる事に価値を見出してきました」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Gracias por la advertencia, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Después del juicio de Vladaym, no me parece que sea precisamente un ejemplo de nada. Cuanto más tiempo pasa, más aprecio la oportunidad de ser un simple camarero».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the warning, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. After Vladaym's trial, I don't exactly find him an inspiring example. The more time passes, the more I appreciate the opportunity to be a simple bartender."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por la advertencia, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Después del juicio de Vladaym, no me parece que sea precisamente un ejemplo de nada. Cuanto más tiempo pasa, más aprecio la oportunidad de ser un simple camarero».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Danke für die Warnung, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Nach Vladayms Prozess halte ich ihn nicht unbedingt für ein leuchtendes Vorbild. Je mehr Zeit vergeht, desto mehr weiß ich die Gelegenheit zu schätzen, eine einfache Barkeeperin zu sein."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the warning, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. After Vladaym's trial, I don't exactly find him an inspiring example. The more time passes, the more I appreciate the opportunity to be a simple bartender."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für die Warnung, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Nach Vladayms Prozess halte ich ihn nicht unbedingt für ein leuchtendes Vorbild. Je mehr Zeit vergeht, desto mehr weiß ich die Gelegenheit zu schätzen, eine einfache Barkeeperin zu sein."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Merci pour l'avertissement, Votre Seigneurie. Je dois dire que le jugement de Vladaym m'a fait comprendre qu'il n'était pas un exemple à suivre. Plus le temps passe, plus je me réjouis de n'être qu'une simple tavernière. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the warning, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. After Vladaym's trial, I don't exactly find him an inspiring example. The more time passes, the more I appreciate the opportunity to be a simple bartender."

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour l'avertissement, Votre Seigneurie. Je dois dire que le jugement de Vladaym m'a fait comprendre qu'il n'était pas un exemple à suivre. Plus le temps passe, plus je me réjouis de n'être qu'une simple tavernière. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Uyarı için teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Vladaym'ın yargılanmasının ardından onu pek de ilham verici bir örnek olarak göremiyorum. Zaman geçtikçe basit bir bar görevlisi olma fırsatının değerini daha iyi anlıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the warning, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. After Vladaym's trial, I don't exactly find him an inspiring example. The more time passes, the more I appreciate the opportunity to be a simple bartender."

traits.locale_text: "Uyarı için teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Vladaym'ın yargılanmasının ardından onu pek de ilham verici bir örnek olarak göremiyorum. Zaman geçtikçe basit bir bar görevlisi olma fırsatının değerini daha iyi anlıyorum."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
